name: The Lost Souls (itch)
description:
Humanity has reached the stars. You are a member of the Security Defense Force as Max you are tasked with uncovering the issue that Earth has been facing since Humanity left. You will have the chance to meet different races, combat other forces and make Earth desirable again. Can you muster the courage to face tragedy, betrayal and all out war just for the soul orbs? Or will you become another Lost Soul. 

Key Features: 
3rd person lite RPG- being able to go wherever you want to tackle the tasks at hand. 

Loot Drop System - All Weapons will be found by loot drop system to keep the players coming back for more action.

Choices - this game has certain story choices that affect the outcome of the overall gameplay no two story playthroughs are the same. 

Difficulty- There is only one Difficulty, Lost Souls is designed to challenge the player and make them feel like they earned every loot drop.

This is our first game and we are actively building it up to make it what the fans will want. So far we have the first level playable and working towards adding more levels and building up from what the Consumers and Fans are expecting. Looking forward to meeting everyone and working with everyone throughout this process.
